ModMetaData.name: World Map Beautification Project - for Medieval Overhaul
ModMetaData.author: Soulknitter
ModMetaData.description:
[h1] Medieval Overhaul Addon [/h1] This is a DLC for the mod "Medieval Overhaul" by SirLalaPyon.
The DLC adds support for the "Medieval Overhaul" mod
[h1] Features [/h1] [b]Dark Forest[/b] - An ancient wilderness tall like no other, a place of dim light and dense, overwhelming vegetation. Commonly used to procure broad variety of cautionary tales for mischievous children. And justly so. Not many live long enough to carry this knowledge out of the forest. - New worldmap tiles inline with "World Map Enhanced"
[h1] Credits [/h1] Odeum for the "World Map Beautification Project" mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2314407956
SirLalaPyon for the "Medieval Overhaul" mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067
Sacrificial Goat for inspiration, resources and their WMBP Patches https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2382824716
[h1] Changelog [/h1] 01/02/2021 - 1.0: Initial Release
